permissions.name: Administer System
permissions.description: Ability to perform all administration functions for the instance: global configuration and personalization of default dashboards.

permissions.name: Administer Quality Profiles and Gates
permissions.description: Ability to perform any action on the quality profiles and gates.

permissions.name: Share Dashboards And Filters
permissions.description: Ability to share dashboards, issue filters and measure filters.

permissions.name: Execute Analysis
permissions.description: Ability to execute analyses, and to get all settings required to perform the analysis, even the secured ones like the scm account password, the jira account password, and so on.

permissions.name: Execute Preview Analysis
permissions.description:
Ability to execute preview analysis (results are not pushed to the server). This permission does not include the ability to access secured settings such as the scm account password, the jira account password, and so on.
This permission is required to execute preview analysis in Eclipse or via the Issues Report plugin.

permissions.name: Provision Projects
permissions.description: Ability to initialize project structure before first analysis.
